body:
Web retargeting pairs tailored messaging and targeted ad placement together to reconnect with your website visitors and grow your business. Launch a web campaign with a message for your audience and we'll assess available ad inventory on new sites, blogs, and other websites to determine where your customer might be browsing and when to best serve your ad.

Web retargeting works well for e-commerce, tech B2B, media and entertainment, and generally if you are interested in engaging current or prospective customers online. It's a strong foundation for any retargeting program.
name: Web Retargeting
title: Web Retargeting
